tool.name: DCA Convergence Tool
tool.command: #import os #set $gpu_str = "--nv" if $gpu else "" #set $sif_name = "dca_0_2_0.sif" if $gpu else "dca_cpu_0_1_0.sif" #set $sif_image = "summit-singularity:0.2.0" if $gpu else "summit-singularity-cpu:0.1.0" module purge && module load DefApps && module load gcc/9.1.0 && mkdir -p portal/conv.bp && source /gpfs/alpine/stf007/world-shared/containers/utils/requiredmpilibs.source && ( [ -e \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR}/$sif_name ] || singularity pull --disable-cache --dir \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR} $sif_name oras://code.ornl.gov:4567/ndip/tool-sources/dca/dca-main/$sif_image ) && cp $input portal/input_file.json && \${GALAXY_COMMAND_PREFIX} singularity exec $gpu_str --bind \$(pwd)/portal:/portal --pwd /portal \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR}/$sif_name /dca/main_dca /portal/input_file.json > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) && #set $storage_folder=os.path.join(str($experiment_name),str($output.hid)+"_"+str($output.history_id)+"_conv.bp") STORAGE_FOLDER=\$PERSISTENT_STORAGE_DIR/$storage_folder && mkdir -p \$STORAGE_FOLDER && mv portal/conv.bp/* \$STORAGE_FOLDER && ln -s \$STORAGE_FOLDER/* portal/conv.bp
tool.help: A tool to run DCA convergence.
